table: IBM compatible keyboard scan codes, set 3
description: Scan code set 3, returned by keyboard hardware when working in set 3. Note that support for this scan code set is less common than 1 and 2.

table columns.name: makecode
table columns.title: Make code
table columns.description: Code sent by keyboard when key is pressed

table columns.name: breakcode
table columns.title: Break code
table columns.description: Code sent by keyboard when key is released
